name: k6-load-test
description: K6 Load Testing with InfluxDB and Grafana

scripts.test:simple: docker-compose exec k6 k6 run simple-test.ts
scripts.test:load: docker-compose exec k6 k6 run test.ts --out influxdb=http://influxdb:8086/k6
scripts.test:stress: docker-compose exec k6 k6 run stress-test.ts --out influxdb=http://influxdb:8086/k6
scripts.test:simple-influx: docker-compose exec k6 k6 run simple-test.ts --out influxdb=http://influxdb:8086/k6
